channel.title: IBI VizEdit on Matt Barstead's Research, Blog, & Repository
channel.description: Recent content in IBI VizEdit on Matt Barstead's Research, Blog, & Repository

item.title: It's Alive! First Evidence that IBI VizEdit Works
item.description: It is official. The program I have spent the better part of a year working on, the very centerpiece of my dissertation, works. Or at least, early indicators are in, and based on 22 cases, some of which required a great deal of manual editing, the program is returning estimates in line with expectations. Backing up, as I trip a little over my excitement, IBI VizEdit is an Rshiny application I created to help our lab process and edit heart rate data.
